abstract: Shares of the troubled insurance giant rose after a report that its new chief executive, Robert H. Benmosche, had sought a reconciliation with his estranged predecessor.
snippet: Shares of the troubled insurance giant rose after a report that its new chief executive, Robert H. Benmosche, had sought a reconciliation with his estranged predecessor.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:01 p.m. Shares of the troubled insurance giant American International Group jumped Thursday after a report that its new chief executive, Robert H. Benmosche, had sought a reconciliation with his estranged longtime predecessor, Maurice R. Greenberg.

headline.main: A.I.G. Soars on Report of Talks With Greenberg
